power.title: Battering Command
power.fluff: The slam of your weapon causes your foe to double over, enabling an ally to capitalize on the opening

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: Effect:The target can make a basic attack against the triggering enemy as either a free interrupt or free reaction.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: The target gainst temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. If the target is bloodied, he or she gains 5 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points instead.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: The target can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier before making the attack.
The triggering attack also knocks the triggering enemy prone.

power.title: Bloody Ending
power.fluff: You guide your allies to finish off a wounded foe

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you and allies in your warlord's aura have a +1 bonus to attack rolls against bloodied enemies, and and can score critical hits on a natural roll of 19 or 20 against them.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: You and allies in the aura also have a bonus to AC against bloodied enemies. The bonus equals one-half your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: You and allies can choose to have combat advantage instead of scoring critical hits on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: You and allies also gain a power bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.
If you hit a bloodied enemy with an attack, the bonus to attack rolls increases to +2.

power.title: Deadly Distraction
power.fluff: You strike your foe hard, delivering a wound that keeps them distracted while you and your allies reposition

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: On your turn, you hit an enemy with a melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] additional damage, or +1d8 additional damage if it isn't a Weapon attack.
Until the end of your next turn, while the triggering enemy remains in your warlord's aura, it cannot trigger actions based on you and your allies' movement.

power.title: Devastating Setup
power.fluff: You knock the enemy aside and call forth a nearby ally to capitulate

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the opportune command class power.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You either slide the target 1 square, or push it up to 3 squares.
You then use your opportune command class power, and must choose the target as the target enemy.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: If the target ally hits, he or she can end one effect on himself or herself that a save can end. If the target ally has no effect that a save can end, he or she can attempt a saving throw against one effect that doesn't normally end on a save.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, the target enemy takes a penalty to all attack rolls with the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: The target ally can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier before making the attack.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: The target ally's attack deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Dicey Predicament
power.fluff: Surrounded by enemies, you fake weakness and make them careless

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must either be flanked, or be adjacent to 3 or more non-minion enemies.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura gain combat advantage against enemies adjacent to you.
If you hit an enemy with a melee attack, allies also gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy while it remains within your reach.

power.title: Follow Me In
power.fluff: You rush into battle with a decisive attack, rallying your friends behind you

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst who can see or hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target ally gains a +1 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: The bonus equals one-half your Intelligence modifier (minimum +1).
You charge an enemy. Your charge attack deals an additional +1[W] damage (+1d8 additinal damage if it is not a Weapon attack).
If your charge attack hits, allies benefiting from the speed bonus deal additional damage against the enemy you charged. The damage equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: If an ally benefiting from the speed bonus charges the same enemy you charged, they have a bonus to all defenses triggered by that charge. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: An ally benefiting from the speed bonus has a bonus to all defenses triggered by their movement. This bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: If an ally benefiting from the speed bonus charges the same enemy you charged, the additional damage increases to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Hold the Line
power.fluff: Hearing your snap commands, your allies hold their ground

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You, or one or more allies in your warlord's aura would be pushed, pulled, or slid

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering forced movement is negated, and one target makes a basic attack as a free reaction against the source of the forced movement.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: Each target has resist all equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier against the triggering attack.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: The ally making the attack can make a melee or ranged at-will attack instead of a basic attack.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: Each target can shift one-half the distance of the forced movement (minimum 1 square) as a free reaction.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: The ally making the attack gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Inspire Resilience
power.fluff: You follow a solid hit with words that bolster your allies

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have hit an enemy with an attack during your current turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have resist all equal to 2 + one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier. If you scored a critical hit during your current turn, the resistance increases by +3.

If an enemy attacks an ally benefiting from this resistance, that ally gains a bonus to the first damage roll he or she makes against that enemy before the end of his or her next turn. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Inspiring War Cry
power.fluff: As you strike, you shout a fierce war cry that shakes your foe and jolts a friend from succumbing to trouble

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: On your turn, you hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering enemy, and one ally in the burst who can hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The penalty increases to -3 if your triggering attack was a critical hit.

The target ally can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. If your triggering attack was a critical hit, the target ally can make a saving throw against any one effect, even if it normally doesn't allow a save.
If the target ally is not under any harmful or negative effect, he or she instead gains a +3 bonus to the first attack roll he or she makes before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Interrupting Combo
power.fluff: Your weapon strikes a foe, forcing it to focus on you lest an ally gets a chance for a strike of his or her own

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: On your turn, you hit an enemy with a melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You deal additional damage equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier to the triggering enemy, and mark it until the end of your next turn.

While it remains marked, the first time the enemy makes an attack that does not include you as a target, one ally in your warlord's aura can take an immediate interrupt to make a basic attack against the marked enemy. If the ally's attack hits, the marked enemy takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls on the triggering attack.
If you have the opportune commmand class power, the enemy and ally count as the target ally and target enemy for all effects.

power.title: Martial Doom
power.fluff: You probe an enemy with an attack, then point out an opening that any ally with will or daring can seize

section.name: Target:
section.target: one enemy that you have attacked during your current turn

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have combat advantage against the target, and deal additional damage against it equal to one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
Each time an ally hits the target with an attack made during an extra action gained by spending an action point, the additional damage increases by +2.

power.title: No Gambit Is Wasted
power.fluff: Noticing that an ally failed at a difficult feat, you interrupt the flow of combat to give him or her another chance to use the attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: One ally in in your warlord's aura misses every target with an encounter or daily attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering ally, and either you or another ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the triggering attack was an encounter attack, the triggering ally regains the use of that power at the start of his or her next turn and gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls with the regained power during that turn. If the triggering attack was a daily attack, he or she regains the use of that power the next time he or she takes a short rest.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: The triggering ally gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: Either the triggering ally or the second target can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free interrupt.
The second target makes a basic attack against a target of the triggering attack as an opportunity reaction.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: The second target can use a melee or ranged at-will attack instead of a basic attack.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: The second target gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Shielding Retaliation
power.fluff: You guide an ally to a powerful retaliation while protecting another that has come under assault

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits an ally adjacent to you

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack hits you instead, and the target ally makes a basic attack against the triggering enemy as a free reaction to the enemy's attack.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: The target ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: The target ally gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: Either the triggering ally or the target ally can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free interrupt.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: The target ally makes his or her attack as a free interrupt to the triggering attack hitting you.

power.title: Warlord's Strike
power.fluff: One convincing strike is all you need to expose the enemy's weakness and spur your allies into finishing it off

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: On your turn, you hit an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] additional damage (+1d8 additional damage if the attack is not a Weapon attack).
Until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to damage rolls against the triggering enemy. The bonus equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, allies in your aura have a bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, allies in your aura gain a bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, allies in your aura gain gain a +1 bonus to speed and a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by their movement equal to your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: The bonus to damage equals your Intelligence modifier.
